title: On the 'art of shunning' – and the risks that come with it
subhead: 'Letters from America' (4/6). Writer and journalist Thomas Chatterton Williams considers the dangers of cancel culture and wokism. It is better to engage in dialogue, even if it is difficult, in the real world than to 'punish and ostracize' on social media, he says.

subhead: Rome has significantly reduced its public deficit over the past three years, while Paris has allowed its own to spiral. title: What is Kick, the platform on which a French streamer died live?
subhead: Raphaël Grave, known online as Jean Pormanove, died Monday during a livestream. The tragedy has shed light on a little-known streaming site and its extremely permissive moderation policies.
